snippet: A pro-North Korea newspaper quoted Kenneth Bae, an imprisoned American missionary, as saying that he felt abandoned by the United States.
abstract: Pro-North Korea newspaper Choson Sinbo releases interview with Kenneth Bae, Korean-American missionary incarcerated in North Korea, in what appears to be part of new effort by North Korean authorities to use him as leverage with the United States; in interview, Bae says that he feels abandoned by his own government and has developed lung and liver ailments.
lead_paragraph: A pro-North Korea newspaper quoted Kenneth Bae, an imprisoned American missionary, as saying that he felt abandoned by the United States.

headline.main: American Held in North Korea Says Health Is Failing
headline.print_headline: American Held in North Korea Says Health Is Failing
